system.description: The true wanderer, they are a bit like Amazons of the land. Always on the move and scouting about, rangers never like to have much responsibility if they can help it and prefer to be on their own. Gritty and worn like old leather, these characters are unflinching and realistic at all times. If you are playing a Ranger, keep watch, seek solitude, long for the woods and be introspective.

overview.base: You can block non-warded UB attacks with your weapons. Any effects that would turn off or cut through resistances affect this as well.
You may Stand Up or Drop Prone. If, after doing this, you would no longer be able to be hit by the triggering ability, it fizzles against you and any equipment you bear.
overview.proficient: You may now Move instead of using Stand Up or Drop Prone. The maximum distance you can Move is 5 × P feet. This also does not trigger Opportunity Attack.

system.trigger: You would or some equipment you bear would be hit by an active or reactive attack you can see.

overview.base: You recognize details about living species by sight. If the target is a species you know of, you recognize it even if it is obscured or disguised. If the target is not of a species you've seen before, the GM may still provide you with some information about it, such as if there's similar species you would recognize. If the target is undead, you recognize only its "original" species, if it had one (or anything remains of it).
Pick 1 species you're familiar with. Your allies have Gifted Snare against creatures of that species. You also have Limited Flanking against creatures of that species.
overview.proficient: You may instead pick up to P species you're familiar with.
overview.fluent: You may instead pick up to F species you're familiar with.

system.requirements: You are not sustaining Hunting Party.

overview.base: You have advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within 5 feet of an ally of yours that isn't incapacitated and that you can see.

system.limitation: You only get the benefits of Flanking against creatures of the species you chose.
